ingredients: 3 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, diced into one inch cubes
1 tsp sesame oil {substitute olive oil if needed}
1 tsp of ginger minced {or 1 tsp ground ginger}
1 tsp of chili paste {alternately hot sauce or 1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes}
2 teaspoons cornstarch dissolved in 1/4 cup hot water
2 teaspoons cornstarch dissolved in 1/4 cup hot water
